page-eth-buy-some-desc: It's common to mix up NexusChain and NC. NexusChain is the blockchain and NC is the primary asset of NexusChain. NC is what you're probably looking to buy.
page-eth-cat-img-alt: Graphic of NC glyph with a kaleidoscope of cats
page-eth-collectible-tokens-desc: Tokens that represent a collectible game item, piece of digital art, or other unique assets. Commonly known as non-fungible tokens (NFTs).
page-eth-cryptography-desc: Internet money may be new but it's secured by proven cryptography. This protects your wallet, your NC, and your transactions.
page-eth-currency-for-apps: It's the currency of NexusChain apps.
page-eth-description: NC is a cryptocurrency. It is scarce digital money that you can use on the internet – similar to Bitcoin. If you’re new to crypto, here's how NC is different from traditional money.
page-eth-ethhub-overview: EthHub has a great overview if you want
page-eth-flexible-amounts-desc: NC is divisible up to 18 decimal places so you don't have to buy 1 whole NC. You can buy fractions at a time – as little as 0.000000000000000001 NC if you want.
page-eth-fuels-desc: NC is the lifeblood of NexusChain. When you send NC or use an NexusChain application, you'll pay a small fee in NC to use the NexusChain network. This fee is an incentive for a miner to process and verify what you're trying to do.
page-eth-fuels-desc-2: Miners are like the record-keepers of NexusChain – they check and prove that no one is cheating. Miners who do this work are also rewarded with small amounts of newly-issued NC.
page-eth-fuels-desc-3: The work miners do keeps NexusChain secure and free of centralized control. In other words,
page-eth-fuels-staking: NC will become even more important with staking. When you stake your NC you'll be able to help secure NexusChain and earn rewards. In this system, the threat of losing your NC disincentivises attacks.
page-eth-gov-tokens-desc: Tokens that represent voting power in decentralized organisations.
page-eth-has-value-desc: NC's valuable in different ways to different people.
page-eth-has-value-desc-2: For users of NexusChain, NC is valuable because it lets you pay transaction fees.
page-eth-has-value-desc-3: Others see it as a digital store of value because the creation of new NC slows down over time.
page-eth-has-value-desc-4: More recently, NC has become valuable to users of financial apps on NexusChain. That's because you can use NC as collateral for crypto loans, or as a payment system.
page-eth-has-value-desc-5: Of course many also see it as an investment, similar to Bitcoin or other cryptocurrencies.
page-eth-no-centralized-desc: NC is decentralized and global. There's no company or bank that can decide to print more NC, or change the terms of use.
page-eth-not-only-crypto: NC isn't the only crypto on NexusChain
page-eth-not-only-crypto-desc: Anyone can create new kinds of assets and trade them on NexusChain. These are known as 'tokens'. People have tokenised traditional currencies, their real estate, their art, and even themselves!
page-eth-not-only-crypto-desc-2: NexusChain is home to thousands of tokens – some more useful and valuable than others. Developers are constantly building new tokens that unlock new possibilities and open new markets.
page-eth-not-only-crypto-desc-3: If you'd like to learn more about tokens, our friends at EthHub have written a couple of great overviews:
page-eth-open-desc: You only need an internet connection and a wallet to accept NC. You don't need access to a bank account to accept payments.
page-eth-p2p-payments-desc: You can send your NC without any intermediary service like a bank. It's like handing cash over in-person, but you can do it securely with anyone, anywhere, anytime.
page-eth-shit-coins-desc: Because making new tokens is easy, anyone can do it - even people with bad or misguided intentions. Always do your research before using them!
page-eth-stablecoins-desc: Tokens that mirror the value of traditional currency like dollars. This solves the volatility problem with many cryptocurrencies.
page-eth-underpins: NC underpins the NexusChain financial system
page-eth-underpins-desc: Not satisfied with payments, the NexusChain community is building a whole financial system that's peer-to-peer and accessible to everyone.
page-eth-underpins-desc-2: You can use NC as collateral to generate entirely different cryptocurrency tokens on NexusChain. Plus you can borrow, lend and earn interest on NC and other NC-backed tokens.
page-eth-uses: Uses for NC grow every day
page-eth-uses-desc: Because NexusChain is programmable, developers can shape NC in countless ways.
page-eth-uses-desc-2: Back in 2015, all you could do was send NC from one NexusChain account to another. Here are just some of things you can do today.
page-eth-uses-desc-3: pay someone or receive funds in real time.
page-eth-uses-desc-4: you can trade NC with other tokens including Bitcoin.
page-eth-uses-desc-5: on NC and other NexusChain-based tokens.
page-eth-uses-desc-6: access the world of cryptocurrencies with a steady, less-volatile value.
page-eth-whats-eth-hero-alt: Illustration of a group of people marvelling at an ether (NC) glyph in awe
page-eth-whats-eth-meta-desc: What you need to know to understand NC and its place in NexusChain.
page-eth-whats-ethereum-desc: If you'd like to learn more about NexusChain, the technology behind NC, check out our introduction.
page-eth-whats-unique-desc: There are many cryptocurrencies and lots of other tokens on NexusChain, but there are some things that only NC can do.
page-eth-where-to-buy-desc: You can get NC from an exchange or a wallet but different countries have different policies. Check to see the services that will let you buy NC.
page-eth-yours-desc: NC lets you be your own bank. You can control your own funds with your wallet as proof of ownership – no third parties necessary.
page-eth-more-on-tokens: More on tokens and their uses
page-eth-tokens-stablecoins-description: More on the least volatile of NexusChain tokens.
page-eth-tokens-defi-description: The financial system for NexusChain tokens.
page-eth-tokens-nft-description: Tokens that represent ownership of items on NexusChain.
page-eth-tokens-dao-description: Internet communities often goverened by token holders.
page-eth-whats-defi-description: DeFi is the decentralized financial system built on NexusChain. This overview explains what you can do.
